reporter_caption.center: POLIVY v. AIR ONE, INC., 243 Conn. 937 (1997)

caption.center: RICHARD B. POLIVY v. AIR ONE, INC., ET AL.

opinion.opinion_text:
The plaintiff's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 46 Conn. App. 573 (AC 15926), is denied.Page 938 David A. Hill, Jr., in support of the petition.
Vincent F. Sabatini, in opposition.
